Name: Fala Lefaliir
Traits: Fey Ancestry. Fala has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put them to sleep. Spellcasting. Fala is a 4th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom. They have the following druid spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh1st level (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave2nd level (3 slots): animal messenger, barkskin
Actions: Quarterstaff. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit or Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit with shillelagh, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.
